title: Concerning the state of my reputation

body: I've never heard of you - but dev away!

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

post.title: Concerning the state of my reputation

author.bio: 12/08/2021 The administrators are no longer committed to free speech on this website, but they will continue to develop the software so that anyone who is interested in hosting a free speech website can do so. Rest in peace, Ruqqus. It was nice.
author.bio_html: 12/08/2021 The administrators are no longer committed to free speech on this website, but they will continue to develop the software so that anyone who is interested in hosting a free speech website can do so. Rest in peace, Ruqqus. It was nice.

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Good, get out of that place. It's just a stupid club for people to pretend they're above everyone else. It'll just end up being an awkwardtheturtle-esque troll server, with the admins involved ready to help with their admin powers. Not good.
body_html: Good, get out of that place. It's just a stupid club for people to pretend they're above everyone else. It'll just end up being an awkwardtheturtle-esque troll server, with the admins involved ready to help with their admin powers. Not good.

post.title: Concerning the state of my reputation

body: I haven't developed it in a few days, since I've been putting a lot of effort into refactoring [ruqqus-js](https://github.com/Ruqqus-API/ruqqus-js), but it's essentially an all-purpose utility (in the name) bot that has a multitude of features. Check the repository in the bot's bio for more information.

post.title: Concerning the state of my reputation

body: Ruqqus Corrective Project, a trolling group made up of mostly prominent old users that led a significant portion of the site's userbase to believe that the CCP and AHS (r/AgainstHateSubreddits) were invading the site.
body_html: Ruqqus Corrective Project, a trolling group made up of mostly prominent old users that led a significant portion of the site's userbase to believe that the CCP and AHS (r/AgainstHateSubreddits) were invading the site.

author.bio: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.
author.bio_html: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.

body: I guess it was secretly a blessing I'm disliked by the Ruqqus Discord and had no reason to get into that RCP stuff. ~~well before this drama everyone told me the Discord wasn't a good place in the first place~~

post.title: Concerning the state of my reputation

body: A conspiracy theory from awhile back formed after captainmeta4 joked in the Ruqqus Discord that he might actually be from Philadelphia: they theorized that he was kicked out of the local community college for making a free speech platform, and that the campus staff were going to brigade the site and try to shut it down.
body_html: A conspiracy theory from awhile back formed after captainmeta4 joked in the Ruqqus Discord that he might actually be from Philadelphia: they theorized that he was kicked out of the local community college for making a free speech platform, and that the campus staff were going to brigade the site and try to shut it down.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

post.title: Concerning the state of my reputation

author.bio: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.
author.bio_html: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.

body: Yeah. I said a few things I shouldn't have and I began to notice I was getting treated much differently.
body_html: Yeah. I said a few things I shouldn't have and I began to notice I was getting treated much differently.
